title: (x) Diamonds Are Forever DVD box movie title - Helvetica {David}
content:
Can anyone make a guess as to the face used to title this video box? I hope the image is good enough to work with...

TIA

David

author: dla_001

comments.content:
Let’s see.... the year is 1971...I’ll go with Helvetica (extra bold condensed italic)

- - - - - - - - - - - -

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033253im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newH.png)
I’m thinking it might be Helvetica Compressed stretched out a bit.
That isn’t event the original art, is it? That is off the stupid DVD.
Nothing is wrong with the movie. I’m a Bond fan. I just hate the way companies lose track of what was there to begin with. Sorry. I’ll keep my mean thoughts to myself.
Haha, I’m just giving you a hard time. I hear you on that...good example: Star Wars.

“That is off the stupid DVD”

Must have been done in “PC Paintbox” then :-)  
ChrisL
